Description: Load content via GET requests triggered by user actions
Do: hx-get on links buttons and form elements
Don't: Full page reloads for content that can load in-place

Description: Submit data via POST for create/update operations
Do: hx-post on forms with proper targets

Description: Specify which element gets updated with response
Do: hx-target with CSS selector to target specific container

Description: Choose appropriate swap strategy for content updates
Do: outerHTML for component replacement innerHTML for content
Don't: Using innerHTML when element structure should change

Description: Control when requests fire based on user interaction
Do: hx-trigger with modifiers like changed delay throttle
Don't: Default trigger when specific timing needed

Description: Load content when element enters viewport
Do: hx-trigger='revealed' or hx-trigger='intersect'
Don't: Loading all content eagerly on page load

Description: Prevent excessive requests on text input
Do: delay modifier with appropriate timing (300-500ms)

Description: Show loading state during requests
Do: hx-indicator pointing to spinner element

Description: Show content placeholder during loading
Do: Swap area with skeleton HTML from server
Code Good: Server returns skeleton HTML → then real content

Description: HTMX should enhance working HTML forms
Do: Start with standard forms that work without JS
Don't: HTMX-only forms that break without JavaScript

Description: _hyperscript for component-level behavior
Do: _hyperscript for toggles animation and simple state

Description: Include CSRF tokens in mutating requests
Do: hx-headers with CSRF token or meta tag configuration

Description: Server should return only safe HTML fragments
Do: Return minimal HTML fragments from server

Description: Live search results as user types
Do: hx-get with debounced trigger targeting results container
Don't: Full page search on form submit

Description: Load more content on scroll to bottom
Do: hx-trigger='revealed' on sentinel element at list end
Don't: Load all data at once or pagination links

Description: Inline editing by clicking on display text
Do: Swap display text with edit form on click
Don't: Separate edit page for inline-editable fields

Description: Select multiple items and apply batch action
Do: Checkboxes with shared target for bulk operations

Description: Load modal content via HTMX
Do: hx-get to load modal content into container
Code Bad: /* All modal content in initial HTML */

Description: Trigger client-side events from server response
Do: HX-Trigger header to notify other components

Description: Return appropriate status codes for error handling
Do: 4xx/5xx for errors with error HTML fragment
Don't: Always return 200 with error in body

Description: Use Alpine.js for client-side state HTMX doesn't handle
Do: Alpine for toggles tabs counters. HTMX for server data

Description: Alpine x-data for component-scoped state
Do: x-data for dropdowns accordions and tabs
Don't: HTMX round trips for local UI state changes

Do: Tailwind utility classes in server-rendered fragments
Don't: Complex CSS that may not apply to swapped content

Description: Boost standard links and forms for SPA-like experience
Do: hx-boost='true' on body or nav container
Don't: Individual hx-get on every navigation link

Description: Update multiple page areas from single response
Do: hx-swap-oob for updating sidebar counters notifications

Do: aria-live on HTMX target containers

Do: hx-on::after-swap to focus new content
